CaseTeamMember.name: CaseTeamMember
CaseTeamMember.description: Represents a case team member, who works with a team of other users to help resolve a case.

MemberId.description: The ID of the user or contact who is a member on a case team.

ParentId.description: The ID of the case with which the case team member is associated.

TeamRoleId.description: The ID of the case team role with which the case team member is associated.

TeamTemplateId.description: The ID of the predefined team with which the case team member is associated.

TeamTemplateMemberId.description: The ID of the team member included in a predefined case team.
